kreport.name: nodeCountMonitorBill

condition.name: orgtype
condition.extend: select v_o.type from v_org v_o group by v_o.type_order,v_o.type order by v_o.type_order

data.tbody: ${0} ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6} ${7} ${8}

kreport.ksql: select base.serialno 工单编号, base.title 工单标题, base.times 流转次数, to_char(base.gendate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 报障时间, round(base.used_time/60000) "工单历时(分钟)", cur.curorg 当前停留部门, cur.curexecuter 当前处理人, base.bns 流转部门 from ( select f.flowlsh, f.serialno, f.title, count(*) times, f.gendate, f.used_time, strcat(distinct f.executergrouporgname) bns from ( select f.flowlsh,f.serialno,f.title,f.gendate,r.used_time,n.nodecode,n.executergrouporgname,n.executergrouporgid,lag (n.executergrouporgid,1,0) over (PARTITION BY n.flowlsh order by n.gendate) lagexecutergrouporgid from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n,chk_assessment_result r where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=r.rec_flow_id and f.status!='XJ' and r.assessment_type='F' #[and i.replytime is ${flowType}] #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate<${endDate}] )f where f.executergrouporgid!=f.lagexecutergrouporgid --与前一个环节不是同一个部门 and f.nodecode!='8704d4d70a11226800834bbe3cb68d92' --省IT中心管控 group by f.flowlsh,f.serialno,f.title,f.gendate,f.used_time #[having count(*)>${times}] ) base, ( select f.flowlsh,strcat(distinct v_o.type) orgtype,strcat(distinct n.executername) curexecuter,strcat(distinct n.executergrouporgname) curorg from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n,sec_org o,v_org v_o where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and n.status in ('DT','DB','SF') and n.executergrouporgid=o.id and o.org_code like v_o.org_code||decode(v_o.org_code,'000110000003','','%') #[and i.replytime is ${flowType}] #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate<${endDate}] group by f.flowlsh ) cur where base.flowlsh=cur.flowlsh(+) #[and cur.orgtype in (${orgtype})] #[and ${isit}( select 1 from rec_node n where n.flowlsh=base.flowlsh and n.executergrouporgid='8a92635521a51e8f0121a5211f0202c1' )--是否流经省中心] order by 流转次数 desc,"工单历时(分钟)" desc
kreport.comment: 报表说明： 1) 流转次数的计算以进出某处理单位为一次，内部连续多次流转次数不累计； 2) 剔除省中心故障管控组环节的次数计算，即流转次数全部针对故障处理部门的，管控组作为管控中转不计入次数；
